reviews.customers_say: Customers find this loungewear set chic and Gucci-inspired, with a high-quality cardigan top and soft fabric that's cozy on chilly days.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent Travel/Lounge Outfit
items.body: This ‚ÄúTravel / Lounge‚Äù outfit is exceptional! I Have been looking for a travel outfit that looks fabulous and wears perfectly! THIS IS THAT OUTFIT! For long airplane rides to Europe, South Afrika, South America this is excellent! Here are the reasons: Material is a tight waffled knit, so if flight is cold this keeps you warm. The material is quality not flimsy and not bulky like sweatpants. Pockets are deep enough for phone and IDs when going through security. Look is flattering with long top, slenderizing pants. It stays crisp looking and doesn‚Äôt get sloppy baggy at your bottom or knees. Comfortable non-binding fit when sitting on an airplane for hours, this will not ride up into your privates. The pant legs are gently closed at ankles with the same ribbed knit as sleeves not elastic. There is no zipper on pants, a comfortable wide waistband that won‚Äôt roll up. Jacket can be buttoned up or worn open with a tank or cami. There are sooo sooo many great selling points. I‚Äôll probably order one or two more in different colors. Read more
items.author: BerniT

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Polished & Cozy Vibes
items.body: If you love looking put together without trying, this 2 piece set is for you!! This knit fabric is soft, comfy and nicely structured to make it elevated. It has designer vibes without the price tag. Perfect for traveling, running errands or hanging out at home. The fit is relaxed but flattering. Read more
items.author: Heather

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Super soft material
items.body: Honest review! True to size. I wear a large and the large fit me perfectly! I don‚Äôt yet know about shrinkage because I just got it today and I have not washed it yet.However, I plan on hanging it when I do wash it and allowing it to air dry. The color looks exactly like it does in the picture The item looks to be well-made, so there‚Äôs no fraying at the seams This set is beautiful and super soft however,‚Ä¶ the pants and the top are made from two different thicknesses of fabric. The pants, in my opinion, are thin and I am sure with any underwear other than something skin tone, people will be able to see through. Additionally, if I wear this when the weather is really cold, I will have to wear the thermals underneath because the cold air would blow right through. Basically, don‚Äôt count on these pants to keep you warm. The top on the other hand, is made from a thicker material, is incredibly soft and absolutely beautiful. It definitely looks designer or high-end from a distance. I do plan on keeping this set however, I don‚Äôt know that I would wear it together often. I am sure I will wear the sweater a whole lot more and pair it with several other things. I also like that the sweater is long enough, so on the rare occasion that I wear this as a set, it will cover my bum. The pants may end up being ones that I just wear around the house to lounge. Another con is the pants do not have pockets! Which is the reason I took off the star. I figure if they weren‚Äôt going to be the best quality they should at least have pockets.. I hope the manufacturer reads this and updates the design to add pockets and either line the pants or use the same material as the top (a thicker texture). Another thing they can do is use the red and green burger on the sweater to make a waist band and ankle cuffs on the pants. This would make the set look even more high end. Read more
items.author: Roxy

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Comfy, Cute Set
items.body: This lounge set is really comfy, fits true to size, and looks great on. The cardigan top feels high-quality and the overall style is super flattering. Just a heads-up: the pants are completely see-through, so they‚Äôre best for at-home wear only. Otherwise, a great set! Read more
items.author: Jess Elyse

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great look and fit
items.body: This is a really nice casual lounge outfit. Fit is really good and the material is nice. Lightweight and comfortable. Washes well and holds shape. Read more
items.author: Jennifer Huskey

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this set!
items.body: I love this set. It is so soft and pretty. Im 5'8 and 165 and got a large which is perfect. I'd normally get an xl but I'm glad I sized down. It's warm and looks great from loungewear to the airport or dressed up with some but loafers and jewelry. The quality is nice, although they should provide an extra button just in case one should fall off. Overall, I am very happy with this set and I highly recommend it. ü©∑ Read more
items.author: John Talley/Christine Talley

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing outfit
items.body: Love, love this sweater set. Very soft and comfy. good length and fit! Worth the price! I am 5'9" and 169 pounds and I ordered a Medium. Read more
items.author: Cindy Doerfer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best winter fit for home
items.body: Cutest lounge set! I wear this on the regular and could be my fav when staying in or even an errand. Love to buttons down the sweater and great quality. Size was great‚Äîoversized style Read more
items.author: Jack_C

short_description:
Womens Dress V Neck is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.
about_this_item:
Womens Dress V Neck is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.
long_description:
Womens Dress V Neck is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Pinkapricot, Burnt Orange, Blackbrown, Contrast White, Striped Beige, Greenwhite, Solidblack, Stripedcolorful, Bluewhite, Contrast Beige, Light Beige, Contrastblack2, Contrastblack3. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
